LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays CMS content published to this community that is tagged with any of the Topics this record is tagged with. For use on a record detail page.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: The Salesforce Id of the record to display CMS content for.

property.name: contentType
property.label: Managed Content Type
property.description: Select the CMS content type to display. Use the developer name of the CMS Content Type.

property.name: numberContentItems
property.label: Max Content Items Returned
property.description: The maximum number of CMS content items to return.

property.name: contentDisplayStyle
property.label: Collection Layout
property.description: The display style. Pick 'Grid' for multiple items displayed at once or 'Carousel' for a click-through slider of multiple items.

property.name: titleAttribute
property.label: CMS Title Field
property.description: Select a text field from the CMS content type to drive the component headline. Use the developer name for the CMS Content attribute you select.

property.name: bodyAttribute
property.label: CMS Teaser Field
property.description: Select a long text field from the CMS content type to drive the teaser text on the component. Use the developer name for the CMS Content attribute you select.

property.name: imageAttribute
property.label: CMS Image Field
property.description: Select an image field from the CMS content type to power the images in the component. Use the developer name for the CMS Content attribute you choose. This MUST be a field/node of type Image.

property.name: pathAttribute
property.label: CMS Page URL Path
property.description: If you customized your CMS item detail page, update this value with the exact path. By default, it's the same as the content type.

property.name: linkAttribute
property.label: CMS Content Detail URL
property.description: The developer name for the CMS Content attribute for the content URL.
